description: "Two coastal navigation maps: one of the Mergui Archipelago off the west coast of Myanmar; and one of Phuket (‘Isle Junkseilon’) and the surrounding islands off the west coast of Thailand. Both feature bathymetry (sea depth), shoals and reefs."
title: "Plan De L'Archipel de Merguy : depuis les Isles Moscos jusqu'à l'Isle Domel"
